title: I want to write to BTS. How can I write to them? - Quora

response.answer_text: You’d have to put down their address which is private for obvious reasons even if you did get to write to them the chances are your letter will get lost because of all the other mail they get
Big Hit put up information in December about how to send letters to their new building. Its a simple Google search away. I dont have the info on hand.
